name: Kokis
description: Crispy flower-shaped cookies for New Year
instructions: Gradually add rice flour and salt
Dip kokis mold in hot oil
Fry in hot oil until crispy
cultural_notes: Essential Sinhala and Tamil New Year sweet
description_sinhala: අලුත් අවුරුද්ද සඳහා හැපෙනසුළු මල් හැඩැති කුකීස්
cultural_notes_sinhala: අත්‍යවශ්‍ය සිංහල සහ දෙමළ අලුත් අවුරුද්ද මිහිරි
cultural_notes_tamil: இன்றியமையாத சிங்கள மற்றும் தமிழ் புத்தாண்டு இனிப்பு
